/circle5Avoid any contact with pregnant or lambing sheep, particularly the after birth as sheep can carry chlamydia & toxoplasmosis. 
/circle5Pigs or pig faeces may be a source of hepatitis E, avoid contact with pigs 
Tests in Pregnancy –Your right to choose 
Blood Tests 
• Full blood count 
• Blood group and antibody screen 
• Rubella immunity 
• Syphilis 
• Hepatitis B 
• HIV 
• Sickle cell and thalassaemia screening 
Urine MSU (mid stream urine) 
Sickle cell and thalassaemia
